conspire.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to secretly plan with someone else to do something illegal
conspire.translation[0].definitions[0].e: All six men admitted conspiring to steal cars.
There was some evidence that he had been conspiring against the government.
conspire.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if events conspire to do something, they happen at the same time and make something bad happen
conspire.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Pollution and neglect have conspired to ruin the city.
Emily felt that everything was conspiring against her.
